Class Triangle_down

  • java.lang.Object
    • td6.view.Figure

  • public class Triangle_down
extends SimpleFigure
    A triangle that can be manipulated and drawn on a canvas.
    Invariants :
    getWidth() >= 0 && getHeight() >= 0, getColor() != null

        Create a new triangle.
        Parameters:
        width - the triangle initial width
        height - the triangle initial height
        x - the triangle initial x location
        y - the triangle initial y location
